title: [Large-scale] Instagram-based Intercultural Communication Competency (ICC) Development Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and comprehension of fundamental mathematics concepts
context.additional_context: Students operate Instagram virtual accounts using personal devices (BYOD), accumulating cross-cultural collaboration experiences while solving math problems. Utilizes a secure virtual space within an educational platform instead of actual SNS posting features

learning_goals: Students can interpret Instagram-style mathematics problems from diverse cultures with 80% accuracy
Learners can create at least three mathematics explanation contents reflecting cultural contexts in virtual Instagram posts
Learning groups can derive and present five mathematical collaboration strategies to overcome intercultural communication barriers.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
